scripts.lint: npm run -s lint:scripts && npm run -s lint:styles
scripts.create-free-pro: export LC_ALL=C; find build/wa-notifier/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==WA Notifier Pro Code Start==/,/==WA Notifier Pro Code End==/d' {} +; find build/wa-notifier-pro/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==WA Notifier Pro Code/d' {} +;
scripts.zip: zip -r build/wa-notifier.zip build/wa-notifier; zip -r build/wa-notifier-pro.zip build/wa-notifier-pro
scripts.deploy: rm -r build/*; yarn move-to-build; yarn create-free-pro; yarn zip;
